payload.instructions:
# sistema-kardex Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-04

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript 5.x + Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router), React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4, (001-kardex-inventory)
- PostgreSQL (primary), MinIO (product images) (001-kardex-inventory)
- PostgreSQL (primary), MinIO (imagenes) (001-panel-pages-navbar)
- TypeScript 5.x + Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router), React 19.2.3, better-auth 1.4.10, Drizzle ORM, Tailwind CSS 4 (001-better-auth-login)
- PostgreSQL (primary), MinIO (assets) (001-better-auth-login)

- TypeScript 5.x + Next.js 16.1.1, React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4 (001-kardex-inventario)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript 5.x: Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes
- 001-better-auth-login: Added TypeScript 5.x + Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router), React 19.2.3, better-auth 1.4.10, Drizzle ORM, Tailwind CSS 4
- 001-panel-pages-navbar: Added TypeScript 5.x + Next.js 16.1.1, React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4
- 001-kardex-inventory: Added TypeScript 5.x + Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router), React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4,


<!-- MANUAL ADDITIONS START -->
<!-- MANUAL ADDITIONS END -->


## Skills
These skills are discovered at startup from multiple local sources. Each entry includes a name, description, and file path so you can open the source for full instructions.
- skill-creator: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Codex's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations. (file: C:/Users/ginol/Desktop/projects/sistema-kardex/.codex/skills/.system/skill-creator/SKILL.md)
- skill-installer: Install Codex skills into $CODEX_HOME/skills from a curated list or a GitHub repo path. Use when a user asks to list installable skills, install a curated skill, or install a skill from another repo (including private repos). (file: C:/Users/ginol/Desktop/projects/sistema-kardex/.codex/skills/.system/skill-installer/SKILL.md)
- Discovery: Available skills are listed in project docs and may also appear in a runtime "## Skills" section (name + description + file path). These are the sources of truth; skill bodies live on disk at the listed paths.
- Trigger rules: If the user names a skill (with `$SkillName` or plain text) OR the task clearly matches a skill's description, you must use that skill for that turn. Multiple mentions mean use them all. Do not carry skills across turns unless re-mentioned.
- Missing/blocked: If a named skill isn't in the list or the path can't be read, say so briefly and continue with the best fallback.
- How to use a skill (progressive disclosure):
  1) After deciding to use a skill, open its `SKILL.md`. Read only enough to follow the workflow.
  2) If `SKILL.md` points to extra folders such as `references/`, load only the specific files needed for the request; don't bulk-load everything.
  3) If `scripts/` exist, prefer running or patching them instead of retyping large code blocks.
  4) If `assets/` or templates exist, reuse them instead of recreating from scratch.
- Description as trigger: The YAML `description` in `SKILL.md` is the primary trigger signal; rely on it to decide applicability. If unsure, ask a brief clarification before proceeding.
- Coordination and sequencing:
  - If multiple skills apply, choose the minimal set that covers the request and state the order you'll use them.
  - Announce which skill(s) you're using and why (one short line). If you skip an obvious skill, say why.
- Context hygiene:
  - Keep context small: summarize long sections instead of pasting them; only load extra files when needed.
  - Avoid deeply nested references; prefer one-hop files explicitly linked from `SKILL.md`.
  - When variants exist (frameworks, providers, domains), pick only the relevant reference file(s) and note that choice.
- Safety and fallback: If a skill can't be applied cleanly (missing files, unclear instructions), state the issue, pick the next-best approach, and continue.

payload.message:
Actualic el navbar para que responda mejor en mvil: el botn del sidebar va a la izquierda, las migas completas se ocultan en pantallas pequeas y se muestra solo la seccin actual, y se ocultan las notificaciones en mvil para evitar desbordes. Cambios en `src/components/layout/app-navbar.tsx`.

Si quieres, siguientes pasos:
1) Verificar en mvil que el breadcrumb corto y el men lateral abren bien.
2) Ejecutar `npm run lint` si quieres validar el estilo.

content.text:
Actualic el navbar para que responda mejor en mvil: el botn del sidebar va a la izquierda, las migas completas se ocultan en pantallas pequeas y se muestra solo la seccin actual, y se ocultan las notificaciones en mvil para evitar desbordes. Cambios en `src/components/layout/app-navbar.tsx`.

Si quieres, siguientes pasos:
1) Verificar en mvil que el breadcrumb corto y el men lateral abren bien.
2) Ejecutar `npm run lint` si quieres validar el estilo.

payload.message:
Ajust el layout del navbar para que las migas no empujen el rea de acciones en desktop. Ahora el bloque izquierdo puede encoger con `overflow-hidden`, evitando que el botn del perfil quede fuera de vista.

Cambio en `src/components/layout/app-navbar.tsx`.

Si an no aparece el icono en PC, dime el ancho aproximado y la ruta exacta (breadcrumb) donde falla para ajustar el truncado.

content.text:
Ajust el layout del navbar para que las migas no empujen el rea de acciones en desktop. Ahora el bloque izquierdo puede encoger con `overflow-hidden`, evitando que el botn del perfil quede fuera de vista.

Cambio en `src/components/layout/app-navbar.tsx`.

Si an no aparece el icono en PC, dime el ancho aproximado y la ruta exacta (breadcrumb) donde falla para ajustar el truncado.

payload.text:
**Reworking navbar layout for visibility**

Im analyzing why the user icon disappears on desktop and why the navbar elements arent aligned at edges. It seems the header's current flex layout with overflow hidden is clipping the right area. I plan to switch the header to a three-column grid layoutleft for sidebar trigger, center for breadcrumbs with truncation, right for user actionsto keep everything visible and aligned properly. I want to keep overflow hidden only on breadcrumb text, not the entire header, so the right side stays accessible. This approach should fix the icon visibility and breadcrumb centering issues. I'll update app-navbar accordingly.

summary.text:
**Reworking navbar layout for visibility**

Im analyzing why the user icon disappears on desktop and why the navbar elements arent aligned at edges. It seems the header's current flex layout with overflow hidden is clipping the right area. I plan to switch the header to a three-column grid layoutleft for sidebar trigger, center for breadcrumbs with truncation, right for user actionsto keep everything visible and aligned properly. I want to keep overflow hidden only on breadcrumb text, not the entire header, so the right side stays accessible. This approach should fix the icon visibility and breadcrumb centering issues. I'll update app-navbar accordingly.

payload.message:
No puedo abrir esos links desde aqu. Adems, `nuqs` ya est instalado (en `package.json`), pero no se usa en el cdigo an (`rg` no encontr imports).

Para poder usarlo en todo el proyecto, necesito que pegues lo esencial de la documentacin (adapter a usar y setup recomendado) o me confirmes:
- App Router (Next.js) con el adapter `next/app`?
- Quieres reemplazar todo uso de `useSearchParams`/`useRouter` por nuqs?
- Hay pginas concretas (filtros, paginacin) donde quieras empezar?

Con eso aplico el setup global y actualizo los componentes necesarios.

content.text:
No puedo abrir esos links desde aqu. Adems, `nuqs` ya est instalado (en `package.json`), pero no se usa en el cdigo an (`rg` no encontr imports).

Para poder usarlo en todo el proyecto, necesito que pegues lo esencial de la documentacin (adapter a usar y setup recomendado) o me confirmes:
- App Router (Next.js) con el adapter `next/app`?
- Quieres reemplazar todo uso de `useSearchParams`/`useRouter` por nuqs?
- Hay pginas concretas (filtros, paginacin) donde quieras empezar?

Con eso aplico el setup global y actualizo los componentes necesarios.

payload.text: **Setting up NuqsAdapter for Next App Router**

summary.text: **Setting up NuqsAdapter for Next App Router**

payload.text:
**Integrating nuqs with searchParams parsing**

I'm setting up nuqs by adding a Providers component in the app to wrap children with NuqsAdapter, then updating the RootLayout to include it. For the login and kardex pages, I'll define search params parsers using createLoader and parseAsString, carefully handling constants and types. I'll put kardex search params in a separate file for reuse, simplify by removing unnecessary helpers, and ensure all relevant pages type their searchParams as Promise<SearchParams>. Finally, I'll patch these changes to implement the updates.

summary.text:
**Integrating nuqs with searchParams parsing**

I'm setting up nuqs by adding a Providers component in the app to wrap children with NuqsAdapter, then updating the RootLayout to include it. For the login and kardex pages, I'll define search params parsers using createLoader and parseAsString, carefully handling constants and types. I'll put kardex search params in a separate file for reuse, simplify by removing unnecessary helpers, and ensure all relevant pages type their searchParams as Promise<SearchParams>. Finally, I'll patch these changes to implement the updates.

payload.name: apply_patch

payload.message:
Configur nuqs a nivel global con el adapter de Next App Router y migr el parsing de search params en servidor para `login` y `kardex` usando `createLoader`. Ya queda listo para usar `useQueryState/useQueryStates` en componentes cliente sin ms setup.

Detalles:
- Adapter global en `src/app/providers.tsx` y envuelto en `src/app/layout.tsx`.
- Search params tipados con nuqs en `src/app/login/page.tsx`, `src/app/(dashboard)/kardex/page.tsx`, y definicin compartida en `src/app/(dashboard)/kardex/search-params.ts`.

Quieres que convierta algn filtro/paginacin especfica a `useQueryState` o `useQueryStates` (por ejemplo en `items/import`)?

- Search params tipados con nuqs en `src/app/login/page.tsx`, `src/app/(dashboard)/kardex/page.tsx`, y definicin compartida en `src/app/(dashboard)/kardex/search-params.ts`.

digo al mcp

En tu `mcp.json` solo aparece el server de Resend con URL de docs (`https://resend.com/docs/mcp`). Eso no implica credenciales ni acceso a tu cuenta. Para que el MCP de Resend funcione, normalmente debes configurar auth/inputs (token) segn su setup.

Quieres que agregue el token en `.vscode/mcp.json` (si tienes uno) o revisar la configuracin exacta que requiere Resend?

content.text:
En tu `mcp.json` solo aparece el server de Resend con URL de docs (`https://resend.com/docs/mcp`). Eso no implica credenciales ni acceso a tu cuenta. Para que el MCP de Resend funcione, normalmente debes configurar auth/inputs (token) segn su setup.

Quieres que agregue el token en `.vscode/mcp.json` (si tienes uno) o revisar la configuracin exacta que requiere Resend?
